citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:35am on 11-
DEC-2023.
The Inspector arrived at the facility and contacted the licensee by phone. The licensee stated he was not at the facility
and would not be available until late evening. The Inspector then left the premises.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:35am on 11-
DEC-2023. 
 
The Inspector arrived at the facility and contacted the licensee by phone. The licensee stated he was not at the facility 
and would not be available until late evening. The Inspector then left the premises. 
 
 
End Section
